Package org.ptolemy.classloading

Interface ClassLoadingStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OSGiClassLoadingStrategy, SimpleClassLoadingStrategy
    public interface ClassLoadingStrategy
    Strategy to be able to switch class loading mechanisms, depending on the needs for a runtime environment (especially for actors and other model entities),

    In a "plain" Java SE runtime, a default implementation would use simple Class.forName() (for Java classes) or local file-lookup (for actor-oriented classes) or similar.

    In an OSGi-based runtime, more advanced options can be implemented to allow dynamic actor class updates, version management etc.

    Since:
    Ptolemy II 11.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    ErwinDL
    Pt.AcceptedRating:
    Yellow (ErwinDL)
    Pt.ProposedRating:
    Yellow (ErwinDL)
